默认的手风琴模式下，最多只能展开一个面板。.en-us: In default accordion mode, at most one panel can be expanded.

设置参数`accordion=False`关闭手风琴模式。.en-us: Set `accordion=False` to turn off accordion mode.

设置参数`defaultActiveKey`控制默认展开项。.en-us: Use `defaultActiveKey` to control the default expanded item.

设置参数`size`控制尺寸规格。.en-us: Use the `size` parameter to control the size.

设置参数`expandIconPosition='right'`控制展开图标靠右.en-us: Set `expandIconPosition='right'` to place the expand icon on the right.

为子项设置参数`extra`添加额外内容。.en-us: Set the `extra` parameter on items to add extra content.

设置参数`ghost=True`开启透明面板格式。.en-us: Set `ghost=True` to enable the transparent panel mode.
